analysis.description:
BancorNetwork.convertForMultiple (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#748-784) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- IEtherToken(fromToken).deposit.value(_amounts[i])() (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#781)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol:
	Contract IEtherToken has payable functions:
	 - deposit (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#399-400)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
supply in BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#914) is a local variable never initialiazed
fee in BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#914) is a local variable never initialiazed

BancorNetwork.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = IBancorConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#880)

BancorNetwork.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(_fromToken,toToken,_amount,_minReturn) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#890-894)

BancorNetwork.convertByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- _amount = converter.change(_fromToken,toToken,_amount,1) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#890-894)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- converter = IBancorConverter(smartToken.owner()) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#922-923)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- (amount,fee) = converter.getReturn(fromToken,toToken,amount) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#964-965)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = converter.getConnectorBalance(toToken) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#953)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = formula.calculateSaleReturn(supply,balance,weight,amount) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#955-957)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- fee = amount.mul(converter.conversionFee()).div(MAX_CONVERSION_FEE) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#957)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- supply = smartToken.totalSupply() - amount (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#960-961)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- supply = smartToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#950-951)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = converter.getConnectorBalance(fromToken) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#930-931)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- amount = formula.calculatePurchaseReturn(supply,balance,weight,amount) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#932-933)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- fee = amount.mul(converter.conversionFee()).div(MAX_CONVERSION_FEE) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#935-936)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- supply = smartToken.totalSupply() + amount (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#939)

BancorNetwork.getReturnByPath has external calls inside a loop:
	- supply = smartToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#926)

Reentrancy in BancorNetwork.validateXConversion (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#556-583):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_path[_path.length - 1] == registry.addressOf(ContractIds.BNT_TOKEN)) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#568)
	- IEtherToken(fromToken).deposit.value(msg.value)() (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#576)
	- assert(bool)(fromToken.transferFrom(msg.sender,this,_amount)) (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#577)
	External calls sending eth:
	- IEtherToken(fromToken).deposit.value(msg.value)() (/unique_chucks/34/0x2c5e6f3a75b4d0fcdeead0fe3c3b32ae8e9b263f.sol#576)
	State variables written after the call(s):
